query.statement: SELECT MANDT, ZKNUM, ZKNUM2, ZTON1, ZTON2, ZTON3, ZTON4, ZTON5, ZTON6, ZTON7, ZTON8, ZTON9, ZTON10, ZTON11, ZTON12, ZTON13, ZTON14, ZTON15, LIFNR,ZHYUN,ERDAT, ERZET, DPTEN, UPTEN, TPLST, BEZEI, ZTEXT, ERNAM, ZCONF, AEDAT, UZEIT, ZCANC, ZCHAN, ZTRANS, ZINDAT, ZINZET, ZOUTDAT, ZOUTZET, AENAM, LAEDA, CHANGE_TIME, CASE WHEN ZTRCOST ='X' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ZTRCOST, ZFULLSET, ZFULLSET2, TPLSTDT1 ,TPLSTDT2 ,TPLSTDT3 ,TPLSTDT4 ,TPLSTDT5 ,TPLSTDT6 ,TPLSTDT7 ,TPLSTDTQTY1 ,TPLSTDTQTY2 ,TPLSTDTQTY3 ,TPLSTDTQTY4 ,TPLSTDTQTY5 ,TPLSTDTQTY6 ,TPLSTDTQTY7 ,TPLSTDTZTON1 ,TPLSTDTZTON2 ,TPLSTDTZTON3 ,TPLSTDTZTON4 ,TPLSTDTZTON5 ,TPLSTDTZTON6 ,TPLSTDTZTON7 FROM SAPHEE.ZLET002 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZKNUM = #ZKNUM# AND ZKNUM2 = '' FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
